skt: 1|17 so 'numānasya viṣayaḥ | 1|18 atdeva ca pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalam |
2|3 tatra svārtha trirūpālliṅgād yadanumeye jñānaṃ tadanumānam |
2|5 trairūpyaṃ punarliṅgasyānumeye sattvameva, sapakṣa eva sattvam,
asapakṣe cāsattvameva niścitam | 2|6 anumeyo 'tra jijñāsitaviśeṣo dharmī | 2|7 sādhyadharmasāmānyena samāno 'rthaḥ sapakṣa |
2|14 yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsvanyeṣūṣalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati, sa svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ |
2|24 te ca tādātmyatadutpattī svabhāvakāryayoreveti tābhyāmeva vastusiddhiḥ |
2|36 viruddhavyāptopalabdhiryathā- na dhruvabhāvī bhūtasyāpi bhāvasya vināśaḥ,
2|42 ime sarve kāryānupalabdhyādayo daśānupalabdhiprayogāḥ svabhāvānupalabdhau saṃgrahamupayānti | 2|43 pāramparyeṇārthāntaravidhipratiṣedhābhyāṃ prayogabhede 'pi |
3|8 tatra sādharmyavatprayogaḥ- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate so 'sad vyavahāraviṣayaḥ siddhaḥ |
nopalabhyate ca kvacit pradeśaviśeṣe upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpo ghaṭa ityanupalabdhiprayogaḥ |
3|9 tathā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ- yat sat tat sarvamanityam,
3|10 yadutpattimat tadanityamiti svabhāvabhūtadharmabhedena svabhāvasya prayogaḥ | 3|11 yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityamityupādhibhedena |
3|12 apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti |
3|14 sannutpattimān kṛtako vā śabda iti pakṣadharmopadarśanam |
3|15 sarva ete sādhanadharmā yathāsvaṃ pramāṇaiḥ siddhasādhanadharmamātrānubandhe eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ |
3|21 kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ - yatra dhūmastatrāgniḥ | yathā mahānasādau |
3|22 ihāpi siddhe eva kāryakāraṇabhāve kāraṇe sādhye kāryaheturvaktavyaḥ |
3|23 vaidharmyavataḥ prayogaḥ- yat sadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eva |
yathā nīlādiviśeṣaḥ | na caivamihopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sata upalabdhirghaṭasyetyanupalabdhiprayogaḥ |
3|24 asatyanityatve, nāsti sattvamutpattimattvaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ vā | saṃśca śabda utpattimān kṛtako veti svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ |
atra cāsti dhūma iti kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ |
3|32 tena hi nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho darśanīyaḥ |
vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavatīti nāvaśayaṃ vākyadvayaprayogaḥ |
3|35 yasmāt sādharmyavatprayoge 'pi yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate, so 'sadvayavahāraviṣayaḥ | nopalabhyate cātropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa ityukte sāmarthyādeva neha ghaṭa iti bhavati |
3|36 tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi- yaḥ sad vyavahāraviṣaya upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ sa upalabhyata eva |
na tathātra tādṛśo ghaṭa upalabhyate- ityukte sāmarthyādeva neha sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti bhavati |
3|40 svarūpeṇaiveti sādhyatvenaiveṣṭo na sādhanatvenāpi | 3|41 yathā śabdasyānityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ,
śabde 'siddhatvāt sādhyaṃ bhavatīti na punastadiha sādhyatvenaiveṣṭam, sādhanatvenāpyabhidhānāt |
tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame 'pi yastadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitu miṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavati |
3|45 iṣṭa iti yatrārthe vivādena sādhanamupanyastaṃ tasya siddhimicchatā so 'nukto 'pi vacanena sādhyo bhavati |
tena noktamātrameva sādhyam- ityuktaṃ bhavati | 3|48 anirākṛta iti- etallakṣaṇayoge 'pi yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭo 'pyarthaḥ pratyakṣānumānapratītisvavacanairnirākriyate, na sa pakṣa iti pradarśanārtham |
3|49 tatra pratyakṣanirākṛto yathā- aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti | (1)
3|53 iti catvāraḥ pakṣābhāsa nirākṛtā bhavanti | 3|54 evaṃ siddhasya asiddhasyāpi sādhanatvenābhimatasya,
svayaṃ vādinā tadā sādhayitumaniṣṭasya, uktamātrasya, nirākṛtasya ca viparyeṇa sādhya iti |
tenaiva svarūpeṇābhimato vādina iṣṭo 'nirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti pakṣalakṣaṇamanavadyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati |
3|57 ekasya rūpasya dharmisambandhasyāsiddho sandehe vāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ |
3|62 yathā vāṣpādibhāvena sandihyamāno bhūtasaṅghāto 'gnisiddhāvupadiśyamānaḥ sandigdhāsiddhaḥ | 3|63 yatheha nikuñje mayūraḥ kekāyitāditi | 3|64 tadāpātadeśabhrame |
3|65 dharmyasiddhāvapyasiddhaḥ- yathā sarvagata ātmeti sādhye sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvam |
3|67 yathā śabdasyānityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatraikadeśe vā vartamānaḥ |
3|69 yathāsarvajñaḥ kaścidvivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rājādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ |
3|71 vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayorvirodhābhāvācca yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa vaktā na bhavatītyadarśane 'pi vyatireko na sidhyanti, sandehāt |
3|76 sa ca dvividho 'pi virodho vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayorna sambhavati | 3|77 na cāviruddhavidheranupalabdhāvapyabhāvagatiḥ |
asapakṣe cāsattvasya | yathā kṛtatvaṃ prayatnānantarīya katvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddho hetvābhāsaḥ |
3|84 anayoḥ sapakṣe 'sattvam, asapakṣe ca sattvamiti viparyayasiddhiḥ |
3|92 nahīṣṭoktayoḥ sādhyatvena kaścidviśeṣa iti | 3|93 dvayo rūpayorekasyāsiddhāvaparasya ca sandehe 'naikāntika |
3|94 yathā vītarāgaḥ kaścit sarvajño vā, vaktṛtvāditi |
3|98 na hi sātmakanirātmakābhyāmanyo rāśirasti yatrāyaṃ prāṇādirvarteta |
3|102 tasmājjīvaccharīrasambandhī prāṇādiḥ sātmakādanātmakācca sarvasmād vyāvṛttatvenāsiddhestābhyāṃ na vyatiricyate |
3|109 evameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāmekaikasya dvayordvayorvā rūpayorasiddhau sandehe vā yathāyogamasiddhaviruddhānaikāntikāstrayo hetvābhāsāḥ |
3|117 tatrodāharaṇam- yat sarvadeśasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhiryugapadabhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam |
abhisambadhyate ca sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhiryugapat sāmānyamiti | 3|118 tatsambandhisvabhāvamātrānubandhinī taddeśasannihitasvabhāvatā |
3|119 na hi yo yatra nāsti sa taddeśamātmanā vyāpnotīti svabhāvahetuprayogaḥ |
3|120 dvitīyo 'pi prayogaḥ- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate na tat tatrāsti |
tadyathā- kvacidavidyamānā ghaṭaḥ | nopalabhyate copalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sāmānyaṃ vyaktyantarāleṣviti |
3|121 trirūpo heturuktaḥ | tāvatā nārthapratītiriti napṛthagdṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayava kaścit | tena nāsya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthagucyateḥ gatārthatvāt |
3|122 hetoḥ sapakṣaḥ eva sattvamasapakṣācca sarvato vyāvṛtto rūpamuktamabhadena |
asatyagnau na kvacid dhūmā yathā mahānasetarayoḥ |

na hyanyathā sapakṣavipakṣayāḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye daśayitum | tatkāryatāniyamaḥ kāryaliṅgasya, svabhāvaliṅgasya ca svabhāvena vyāptiḥ | asmiścārthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭāntā bhavatiḥ,
3|126 tathānanvayo 'pradarśitānvayaśca | yathā- yo vaktā sa rāgādimān,
atra vaidharmyodāharaṇam- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikamu padiṣṭavān |
3|131 sandigdhasādhanavatireko yathā- na trayividā brāhmaṇe grāhyavacana kaścid vivikṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvāditi |
atra vedharmyodāharaṇam- ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ,
gautamādibhyo rāgādimattvasya sādhanadharmasya vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā | 3|132 sandigdhobhayavyatireko yathā- avitarāgāḥ kapilādayaḥ,
parigrahāgrahayogāditi | atra vaidharmyaṇodāharanam- yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgraha,
vaidharmyeṇodāharaṇam - yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti, na sa vaktā |
yadyapyupalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyāvṛtta tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatiraikāsiddheravyatirakaḥ |
tib: འོན་ཀྱང་འདོད་ཆགས་དང་བྲལ་བ་ཐམས་ཅད་སྨྲ་བ་མ་ཡིན་ནོ་ཞེས་བྱ་བར་ཁྱབ་པར་ལྡོག་པ་མ་གྲུབ་པའི་ཕྱིར་ལྡོག་པ་མེད་པ་ཡིན་བ་ལྟ་བུའོ་༎ ཡིན་ཏེ་། ། ཀྱི་། ནོ་༎ ལྡོག་པ་རབ་ཏུ་མ་བསྟན་པ་ནི་བ་ལྟ་བུའོ་༎ ཡིན་ཏེ་། ། ཀྱི་། ནོ་༎

skt: 3|134 apradarśitavyatireko yathā- anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādākāśavaditi vaidharmyeṇa |
3|136 na hyebhirdṛṣṭāntābhāsairhetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣo ca sarvatrāsattvameva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā |
3|138 ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktāsteṣāmudbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam |
